name: Mini Project: Elements
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Each square represents an element
(Red = fire, white = air, green = earth, blue = water)

You will be given elements written out as a word flashing on the screen. Bring your mouse over the element you are being prompted with, keep doing this for as long as possible. (a score of 120 is physically impossible)

Try not to get thrown off by the changing position/color of the words!

Good luck!

Enjoy!

This game was made in 2 hours for a mini game jame
